We've recently been looking at robot companions to humans. But now let's now look at a kind of robot co-worker. Twelve schools around Europe are now working on developing an exoskeleton for the workplace. Professor Darwin Caldwell at the Italian Institute of Technology has been working on the project. He says it's not about how a robotic suit would make you super strong. It's about helping you with endurance.Â

description: It's not about strength. It's about endurance.
title: Exoskeleton under development in Europe
teaser: It's not about strength. It's about endurance.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, October 14, 2013
contentencoded: We've recently been looking at robot companions to humans. But now let's now look at a kind of robot co-worker. Twelve schools around Europe are now working on developing an exoskeleton for the workplace. Professor Darwin Caldwell at the Italian Institute of Technology has been working on the project. He says it's not about how a robotic suit would make you super strong. It's about helping you with endurance.
